程序包 cn.qfys521.file

类 Config<T>

java.lang.Object
cn.qfys521.file.Config<T>
类型参数:
T - The type of data stored in the configuration file.
public class Config<T> extends Object
This class provides a configuration utility for managing generic data loaded from and saved to files. It utilizes Jackson for serialization and deserialization.

  • 构造器概要

    方法
    说明

    loadOrFail()
    Loads the configuration data from the configured file, throwing an exception on failure.
    void
    saveOrFail()
    Saves the current configuration data to the specified file, throwing an exception on failure.

    Converts the current configuration data to a JSON string.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • Config

      public Config (T t, String fileName, Class<T> clazz)
      Creates a new Config instance with the provided file name and data class.
      参数:
      t - The initial data object to store in the configuration.
      fileName - The name of the configuration file.
      clazz - The class representing the type of data to be stored.

    • Config

      public Config (T t, File file, Class<T> clazz)
      Creates a new Config instance with the provided file and data class.
      参数:
      t - The initial data object to store in the configuration.
      file - The File object representing the configuration file.
      clazz - The class representing the type of data to be stored.

  • 方法详细资料

    • saveOrFail

      public void saveOrFail()
      Saves the current configuration data to the specified file, throwing an exception on failure.

    • loadOrFail

      public T loadOrFail()
      Loads the configuration data from the configured file, throwing an exception on failure. If the file doesn't exist, it will be created with default data (provided `t` field).
      返回:
      The loaded configuration data as an instance of type T.

    • toJson

      public String toJson()
      Converts the current configuration data to a JSON string.
      返回:
      The JSON representation of the configuration data.
